text: Gildo Vinícius Coelho de Almeida (born 13 April 1987) is a Brazilian actor. He began his career in 2009 in Multishow series, Beijo, Me Liga, and gained prominence in the 19th season of the telenovela Young Hearts in 2011. I Love Paraisópolis in 2015 Amor.com in 2017 and Nos Tempos do Imperador in 2021. Gil dated actresses Monique Alfradique and Fabiúla Nascimento. Coelho was born in Rio de Janeiro. == Filmography == Films & TV Year Title Role Notes 2009 Beijo Me Liga Elepê 2010 Por Toda Minha Vida Luiz Schiavon Episode: "RPM" 2011 Acampamento de Férias Túlio Season 2 Malhação Conectados Guido Fernandes Season 19 2014 Na Realidade João Azevedo Movie Não Pare Na Pista Marco Movie 2015 I Love Paraisópolis Lindomar Recanto de Queiroz S.O.S.
